iaik.pdf.signature

Interface CertificationSignature

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApprovalSignature, PdfSignatureDetails
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificationSignatureItext, CertificationSignaturePdfBox

    public interface CertificationSignature
extends ApprovalSignature
    Certification signature as specified in the PDF specification (PDF 32000). This signature is an approval signature extended by the settings whether certain modifications are allowed without invalidating the signature or not. A certification signature should also contain a legal content attestation, to confirm that the signer used or did not use any content that may change the document's appearance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CertificationSignature.ModificationPermission
      Specifies the types of objects, that may be changed without invalidating the certification signature.

      LegalContentAttestation getLegalContentAttestation()
      Extract the legal content attestation contained in the document.
      CertificationSignature.ModificationPermission getModificationPermission()
      Check what kind of modifications are allowed, returns null if the document contains no certification signature.

    • Method Detail

      • getLegalContentAttestation

        LegalContentAttestation getLegalContentAttestation()
                                            throws PdfSignatureException
        Extract the legal content attestation contained in the document.
        Returns:
        the legal content attestation
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if no signed document has been specified with initVerify

      • getModificationPermission

        CertificationSignature.ModificationPermission getModificationPermission()
                                                                 throws PdfSignatureException,
                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Check what kind of modifications are allowed, returns null if the document contains no certification signature.
        Returns:
        ModificationPermission as given in the certification signature or null if not defined
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if more than one certification signature was found
        java.io.IOException - if the document can't be read
